changelog: Initial pre-alpha release of Eleanor DFIR Platform
Setup wizard with guided first-time configuration
Integration with Velociraptor, DFIR-IRIS, Timesketch, and OpenCTI
31+ forensic artifact parsers using Dissect framework
Workbooks system for custom dashboards and queries

message: Eleanor v1.0.0-alpha.1 is available for testing. The OVA file (2.7GB) exceeds GitHub's file size limit - see the GitHub release page for download instructions.
